attributes.action: Ban Dead Baby Jokes Book To Be Sold On Amazon
attributes.additional_details: Get the book "dead baby jokes" banned from selling in UK, the book is currently being sold on Amazon and it's disgraceful... the book must not be sold in the UK to anyone and must be taken off the market immediately... if you feel strongly about the dead baby jokes being on facebook, then sign this petition to get the book banned from ever being sold in the UK and also to be stopped being sold on Amazon's website
